images.description: Image by Jim Riffle of region near spiral galaxy IC 4721, also showing PGC 62063, which is sometimes misidentified as IC 4721, and sometimes called IC 4721A
DSS image of spiral galaxy IC 4721, merged with a Wikisky cutout of an image uploaded by Jim Riffle to provide extra detail
Carnegie-Irvine Galaxy Survey image of spiral galaxy IC 4721, also showing PGC 62063, which is sometimes misidentified as IC 4721, and often called IC 4721A
